document_data.caption: The proxies of the Earthmother, with Leviathan at the bottom.
document_data.name: Leviathan
document_data.mainbody: The '''leviathan''' was a huge [[whale]] and child proxy of the [[Earthmother]] of the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Description: A great black-skinned whale, the leviathan was larger than any whale naturally found on [[Toril]]. Fully {{SI|360|ft}} long, the beast's tail was {{SI|60|ft}} wide and the creature had a mouth full of razor-sharp teeth.
document_data.Abilities: The leviathan was mortal and could grow old and die like any other [[natural creature]]. Though it was immortal in a sense, its spirit would be reborn in time after it died.
document_data.History:
The behemoth slumbered for centuries until awakened by the Goddess in [[1345 DR]].

The leviathan was killed by several poisoned poles attached to the ships in which [[Kazgoroth]], disguised as [[Thelgaar Ironhand]], led an army of northerners against the [[Ffolk]] of the southern Moonshae Isles.
